name: Innovative Solutions & Support, Inc.
description: Innovative Solutions & Support, Inc. (ISSC) is a technology company that specializes in providing advanced solutions for the aviation industry. Founded in 1998, ISSC focuses on developing cutting-edge flight data management systems, cockpit displays, and other avionics products aimed at enhancing the safety and efficiency of aircraft operations. The company is known for its innovative approach to aviation technology, offering products such as the Advanced Flight Information Management System (AFIMS) and a variety of cockpit interface solutions that improve pilot situational awareness. ISSC's mission is to enhance the safety and performance of aircraft through high-quality, reliable technology that meets the evolving needs of the aviation sector. The company serves a range of clients, including commercial airlines, military operators, and aircraft manufacturers, ensuring that its solutions are tailored to meet the specific requirements of each segment. With a commitment to research and development, ISSC actively collaborates with industry partners to advance aviation technology and maintain a competitive edge in a rapidly changing market. As the aviation industry continues to evolve, ISSC remains dedicated to providing innovative solutions that improve safety, efficiency, and overall performance in the skies.
